directions: Mix the yogurt and whipped topping together in a large bowl. Stir in the strawberry gelatin and the sugar. Mix until well dissolved. If a richer taste is desired, whisk in the strawberry flavored cream cheese until smooth. Garnish with fresh strawberries.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
title: Creamy Strawberry Fruit Dip
